trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hammond
There were no other sightings in Hammond on or around July 29th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving north on kennedy ave,movement in the sky,a balloon,i realised it was nota balloon when i saw it was flying aganist the wind,i tried to pull over butcould not due to traffic. it was silverwhite and flew from the NW to SE,it flewin a straight line from NW to SE.lost sight as it flew south and i moved north.iam an amateur astronomer and have seen many strange things at night, but nothinglike this durning the day. i am also a world war two reseacher and am constantlylooking up durning the day, looking for aircraft and at night watchingsatellites,stars, planets and meteorites. i have been doing this for 28 yearsand have identifed unknown objects many times before. such as military aircraftat night, fireballs, satellites,balloons.
Summary: i saw a silver white disk
